name: Real Limo City Driving
description:
Drive the big limousine and be careful at turns and edges and don't hit any pedestrians or other cars. Pick up VIP customers and drop them off to their destinations. You have to keep the customer happy and be careful how you drive. The VIP's mood can change very quickly. Don't go off road or hit other cars and objects else the customer will get angry and give you a bad rating.

This game comes with great controls and eye pleasing User Interface. New and better limo model with traffic system and pedestrians on the streets.
